mcq.statement: Choose the correct punctuated sentence: Naila’s aunt, a caring lady, always bought her cakes, sweet, and a nice fresh orange., Naila’s aunt, a caring lady, always bought her cakes, sweet, and nice fresh orange., Naila’s aunt, a caring lady always bought her cakes, sweet, and nice fresh orange., None of these.

options.a: Naila’s aunt, a caring lady, always bought her cakes, sweet, and a nice fresh orange.
options.b: Naila’s aunt, a caring lady, always bought her cakes, sweet, and nice fresh orange.
options.c: Naila’s aunt, a caring lady always bought her cakes, sweet, and nice fresh orange.
